MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL53  postcode area of Pwllehli, affecting properties in Bryncroes and surrounding areas.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:28PM.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site needed to isolate the power to other properties and we now expect all power to be restored by 3AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:06PM on 12th March 2021
